text: Kandi utuze abantu k’umusi bazoshikirwa n’ibihano vy’Imana, hanyuma baze bavuge bamwe bahemukiye imitima yabo bati:- Muremyi wacu, turindirize umwanya mutoyi gusa hanyuma twitabire ubutumwa bwawe, hanyuma dukurikire intumwa z’Imana, mbega ntimwari mwarahiye kuva kera yuko mwebwe mutazo kwimuka muja ahariho hose
